item.title: Docker Ce
item.author: afatonii2016@gmail.com (Alif Fathon)
item.description: Cara Install Docker OS : Ubuntu 20.04/18.04/16.04 (LTS) Arch: x86_64 (amd64), armhf, arm64 Uninstall Versi Lama (bawaan repo ubuntu) sudo apt-get remove docker docker-engine docker.io containerd runc sudo rm -rf /var/lib/docker/ Install from Repository apt-get update apt-get install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl gnupg-agent software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | apt-key add - apt-key fingerprint 0EBFCD88 pub rsa4096 2017-02-22 [SCEA] 9DC8 5822 9FC7 DD38 854A E2D8 8D81 803C 0EBF CD88 uid [ unknown] Docker Release (CE deb) <docker@docker.

item.title: Hugo Nofancy
item.author: afatonii2016@gmail.com (Alif Fathon)
item.description: Quick Start Static Content Generator with HuGO Install Latest GO Download Site: https://golang.org/dl/ download versi terbaru untuk OS mu, misal go1.15.linux-amd64.tar.gz untuk Linux Mint 18.3 64bit Cara Installnya, cukup extract ke /usr/local utk dipakai secara global di sistem atau di $HOME/.bin untuk dipakai di user tersebut saja, cd ~ cd Downloads sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.15.linux-amd64.tar.gz #global tar -C $HOME/.bin -xzf go1.15.linux-amd64.tar.gz #local kemudian masukkan path hasil extract tadi ke environment variable sistem
